string.value: You aren't sure which scent would go best with which costume. Why don't you leave it up to #bLala#k?
Rush to #bLana#k before the scent fades and ask her which costume this rose scent would best complement.
#bLana#k said the rose scent would go best with the Kid Mannequin's Bunny Suit. Time to tell #bLala#k.

string.name: message
string.value: 향긋한 장미향기가 온몸을 감싸는 순간 이상하게 머리가 아프고 발걸음이 무거워 진다. 향기가 사라지기 전에 라나에게 가보자.

#h0#, have you thought about which perfume goes with which outfit?\r\n#L0##bWell, I thought about it, but I'm not an expert. Shouldn't we ask Lana from Big Hit Records? She has an opinion about everything.#l\n#k
Great idea! I'll spray the Pink Perfume first. Could you ask her what she thinks?
I've sprayed the Pink Perfume on you. Please go to #bLana#k and ask her what she thinks before the lovely rose scent fades.
Is the smell embarrassing you? I think it's just lovely.
You have the costumes ready, I presume? \r\n#L0##bYup! I have Kid Mannequin's Bunny Suits, Female Mannequin's Wigs, and Male Mannequin's Fedoras!#l\n#k

What is this scent I smell on you? \r\n#L0##bWe have perfumes to go with the costumes, but Lala couldn't decide which fragrance should go with which costume. Which costume do you think goes best with this rose scent?#l\n#k
Hm, a light, rose fragrance. I know exactly which outfit it should go with. Will you tell Lala what I've decided?
I think the rose scent should go with the Kid Mannequin's Bunny Suit. Please tell #bLala#k for me.
What smell? Why don't you ask Lala to spray you with more perfume?
Please hurry to #bLana#k and ask her before the scent fades.
